ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment made by the Directors of the Bank of Canada of TIFF MACKLEM of Toronto, Ontario, to be Governor of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of seven years, effective June 3, 2020.
